resources.string:
1) The audio can only be played 				twice by the gamer. 
 
				2) The gamer has two chances 		 to check the answer. 
 
				3) The gamer will not receive 		 any points for skipping any audio. 
 
				4) The gamer must write an exact patterned answer, for example, if the audio plays am / I am, he must type it in the precise format without using an 		apostrophe sign. 
 
				5) If a player presses the check button during the countdown, he forfeits his one chance to double-check the answer. 
 
				6) The player can't skip the 	audio while hitting the play button; that is, he can't click the play button 	and skip the audio at the same time. 
 
				7) Only if the player's answer is 80 percent right will he receive a point for that audio.
